text: Hugh Jesse Arnelle (December 30, 1933 â€“ October 21, 2020) was an American basketball player and attorney. He was born in New Rochelle, New York. From 1955 to 1956, he played for the Fort Wayne Pistons. Arnelle died on October 21, 2020 from heart disease in San Francisco, aged 86.Hugh Jesse Arnelle ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from heart disease Category:Detroit Pistons players Category:Lawyers from New Rochelle, New York Category:Sportspeople from New Rochelle, New York Category:Businesspeople from New York (state)
